title: Bioshock Infinite version 1.1.25.5165+all dlc's repack Mr DJ
description:
BioShock Infinite version 1.1.25.5165 + all dlc's repack Mr DJ

LOSSLESS Repack by Mr DJ (Me)
BioShock Infinite version 1.1.25.5165 + all dlc's unlocked

Repack features:

Do not cut/recoded;
Game Version - 1.1.25.5165;
Voice Language : English;
Subtitles: English and Russian;
Precracked - install and play ;
Install Time - 35 minutes [Quad Core];
Final size: 38.1gb;
Crack based on: RELOADED
Operating system: Win Vista,Win 7,Win 8,Win 8.1 (both 32bit and 64bit);

Split the setup files into less than 4gb chunks so that u can store it on DVDx5

DLC included:

 + Clash in the Clouds
 + Burial at Sea - Episode 1
 + Burial at Sea - Episode 2
 + The Early Bird Special Pack
 + Comstock's China Broom Shotgun
 + Comstock's Bird's Eye Sniper Rifle
 + Industrial Revolution Rewards Pack
 + Industrial Revolution
 + Upgrade Pack

The game is updated and precracked. All u have to do is install and play. Dlc's will be ready from the start of the game.

Make sure you have around 18gb free in C: drive(temporary) for unpacking.

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

If u already have any version of Bioshock Infinite installed, uninstall it before installing this.
It is recommended that u close all other applications before continuing.

Open 'Bioshock infinite repack Mr DJ.part1.exe' , wait for around 2 minutes for self extractor to open, specify the directory where u want to extract the setup folder.
OR
Extarct it yourself by opening any other part using 'WinRAR' 

DISABLE YOUR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING SETUP (IMPORTANT) as the antivirus will mark 'setup' as a suspicious file,, making it unable to launch setup or may run it but with some glitches,, same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...Latest 'Dotnetframe' is required to run the setup (provided)

After running setup,, click on 'Configure',, specify the install directory,, click on next and next,, select the necessary software (Direct X,both Visual c++ updates[provided in Redist folder]),, again next,, finally on 'Install'...play from desktop shortcut....

Always open the game using 'Run as administrator' to avoid crash/savegame issue. If it still crashes, lower the graphics settings from options ingame and make sure you meet the system requirements. 

If you are still unable to get it working, feel free to ask here or drop a private message on my facebook page.

IF YOU LIKE THE REPACK,, GIVE FEEDBACK AND SEED.......
